articles.author: Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Anushka Sharma’s reaction after Virat Kohli’s dismissal in WTC final goes viral; netizens call it ‘collective sentiment of Indians’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Taken right after the Australian team claimed Kohli's wicket, the image shows a shattered Anushka leaning forward, her hands folded and pressed against her chin, reflecting her deep distress.
articles.content: Crushing the hopes of millions of cricket fans across the country, Australia defeated India by 209 runs to win the 2023 edition of the World Test Championship on Sunday. Despite India’s efforts to mo… [+1699 chars]
